Package net.krotscheck.dfr.stream

Data converters for file formats that are binary or require an input stream.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    IStreamDecoder
    This interface describes a data stream decoder, which adds additional methods to managing data via InputStreams.
    IStreamEncoder
    This interface describes a data stream encoder, which adds additional methods to managing data via OutputStreams.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractStreamDecoder
    An abstract implementation of the an input-stream based data decoder.
    AbstractStreamEncoder
    An abstract implementation of the data encoder, to consolidate some common functionality and provide a simple extension point.

Package net.krotscheck.dfr.stream Description

Data converters for file formats that are binary or require an input stream.
Author:
Michael Krotscheck
